verses.verse: Then <WG3767> verily<WG3303> the<WG3588> first<WG4413> covenant had<WG2192> also<WG2532> ordinances<WG1345> of divine service,<WG2999> and<WG5037> a worldly<WG2886> sanctuary.<WG39>

For <WG1063> there was a tabernacle<WG4633> made;<WG2680> the<WG3588> first,<WG4413> wherein<WG1722> <WG3739> was the<WG5037> <WG3739> candlestick,<WG3087> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> table,<WG5132> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> shewbread;<WG4286> <WG740> which<WG3748> is called<WG3004> the sanctuary.<WG39>
And <WG1161> after<WG3326> the<WG3588> second<WG1208> veil,<WG2665> the tabernacle<WG4633> which is called<WG3004> the holiest of all;<WG39> <WG39>

Which had<WG2192> the golden<WG5552> censer,<WG2369> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> ark<WG2787> of the<WG3588> covenant<WG1242> overlaid<WG4028> round about<WG3840> with gold,<WG5552> wherein<WG1722> <WG3739> was the golden<WG5553> pot<WG4713> that had<WG2192> manna,<WG3131> and<WG2532> Aaron's<WG2> rod<WG4464> that budded,<WG985> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> tables<WG4109> of the<WG3588> covenant;<WG1242>

And <WG1161> over<WG5231> it<WG846> the cherubim<WG5502> of glory<WG1391> shadowing<WG2683> the<WG3588> mercy seat;<WG2435> of<WG4012> which<WG3739> we cannot<WG2076> <WG3756> now<WG3568> speak<WG3004> particularly.<WG2596> <WG3313>

Now <WG1161> when these things<WG5130> were thus<WG3779> ordained,<WG2680> the<WG3588> priests<WG2409> went<WG1524> always<WG1275> into<WG1519> <WG3303> the<WG3588> first<WG4413> tabernacle,<WG4633> accomplishing<WG2005> the<WG3588> service<WG2999> of God.

But <WG1161> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> second<WG1208> went the<WG3588> high priest<WG749> alone<WG3441> once<WG530> every year,<WG1763> not<WG3756> without<WG5565> blood,<WG129> which<WG3739> he offered<WG4374> for<WG5228> himself,<WG1438> and<WG2532> for the<WG3588> errors<WG51> of the<WG3588> people: <WG2992>

The <WG3588> Holy<WG40> Ghost<WG4151> this<WG5124> signifying,<WG1213> that the<WG3588> way<WG3598> into the<WG3588> holiest of all<WG39> was not yet<WG3380> made manifest,<WG5319> while as the<WG3588> first<WG4413> tabernacle<WG4633> was<WG2192> yet<WG2089> standing: <WG4714>

Which <WG3748> was a figure<WG3850> for<WG1519> the<WG3588> time<WG2540> then present,<WG1764> in<WG2596> which<WG3739> were offered<WG4374> both<WG5037> gifts<WG1435> and<WG2532> sacrifices,<WG2378> that could<WG1410> not<WG3361> make him that did the service perfect,<WG5048> <WG3588> <WG3000> as pertaining<WG2596> to the conscience;<WG4893>

Which stood only<WG3440> in<WG1909> meats<WG1033> and<WG2532> drinks,<WG4188> and<WG2532> divers<WG1313> washings,<WG909> and<WG2532> carnal<WG4561> ordinances,<WG1345> imposed<WG1945> on them until<WG3360> the time<WG2540> of reformation.<WG1357>

But <WG1161> Christ<WG5547> being come<WG3854> a high priest<WG749> of good things<WG18> to come,<WG3195> by<WG1223> a greater<WG3187> and<WG2532> more perfect<WG5046> tabernacle,<WG4633> not<WG3756> made with hands,<WG5499> that is to say,<WG5123> not<WG3756> of this<WG5026> building;<WG2937>

Neither <WG3761> by<WG1223> the blood<WG129> of goats<WG5131> and<WG2532> calves,<WG3448> but<WG1161> by<WG1223> his own<WG2398> blood<WG129> he entered in<WG1525> once<WG2178> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> holy place,<WG39> having obtained<WG2147> eternal<WG166> redemption<WG3085> for us.

For <WG1063> if<WG1487> the<WG3588> blood<WG129> of bulls<WG5022> and<WG2532> of goats,<WG5131> and<WG2532> the ashes<WG4700> of a heifer<WG1151> sprinkling<WG4472> the<WG3588> unclean,<WG2840> sanctifieth<WG37> to<WG4314> the<WG3588> purifying<WG2514> of the<WG3588> flesh: <WG4561>

How much<WG4214> more<WG3123> shall the<WG3588> blood<WG129> of Christ,<WG5547> who<WG3739> through<WG1223> the eternal<WG166> Spirit<WG4151> offered<WG4374> himself<WG1438> without spot<WG299> to God,<WG2316> purge<WG2511> your<WG5216> conscience<WG4893> from<WG575> dead<WG3498> works<WG2041> to serve<WG3000> the living<WG2198> God?<WG2316>

And <WG2532> for this cause<WG1223> <WG5124> he is<WG2076> the mediator<WG3316> of the new<WG2537> testament,<WG1242> that<WG3704> by means of death,<WG2288> <WG1096> for<WG1519> the redemption<WG629> of the<WG3588> transgressions<WG3847> that were under<WG1909> the<WG3588> first<WG4413> testament,<WG1242> they which are called<WG2564> might receive<WG2983> the<WG3588> promise<WG1860> of eternal<WG166> inheritance.<WG2817>
For <WG1063> where<WG3699> a testament<WG1242> is, there must also of necessity<WG318> be<WG5342> the death<WG2288> of the<WG3588> testator.<WG1303>

For <WG1063> a testament<WG1242> is of force<WG949> after men are dead:<WG1909> <WG3498> otherwise<WG1893> it is of no strength at all<WG2480> <WG3379> while<WG3753> the<WG3588> testator<WG1303> liveth.<WG2198>
Whereupon <WG3606> neither<WG3761> the<WG3588> first<WG4413> testament was dedicated<WG1457> without<WG5565> blood.<WG129>

For <WG1063> when<WG5259> Moses<WG3475> had spoken<WG2980> every<WG3956> precept<WG1785> to all<WG3956> the<WG3588> people<WG2992> according<WG2596> to the law,<WG3551> he took<WG2983> the<WG3588> blood<WG129> of calves<WG3448> and<WG2532> of goats,<WG5131> with<WG3326> water,<WG5204> and<WG2532> scarlet<WG2847> wool,<WG2053> and<WG2532> hyssop,<WG5301> and sprinkled<WG4472> both<WG5037> the<WG3588> book,<WG975> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> the<WG3588> people,<WG2992>
saying, <WG3004> This<WG5124> is the<WG3588> blood<WG129> of the<WG3588> testament<WG1242> which<WG3739> God<WG2316> hath enjoined<WG1781> unto<WG4314> you.<WG5209>
Moreover <WG3668> he sprinkled<WG4472> with blood<WG129> both<WG1161> the<WG3588> tabernacle,<WG4633> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> the<WG3588> vessels<WG4632> of the<WG3588> ministry.<WG3009>

And <WG2532> almost<WG4975> all things<WG3956> are by<WG2596> the<WG3588> law<WG3551> purged<WG2511> with<WG1722> blood;<WG129> and<WG2532> without<WG5565> shedding of blood<WG130> is<WG1096> no<WG3756> remission.<WG859>

It was therefore<WG3767> necessary<WG318> that the<WG3588> <WG3303> patterns<WG5262> of things<WG3588> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> heavens<WG3772> should be purified<WG2511> with these;<WG5125> but<WG1161> the<WG3588> heavenly things<WG2032> themselves<WG846> with better<WG2909> sacrifices<WG2378> than<WG3844> these.<WG5025>

For <WG1063> Christ<WG5547> is not<WG3756> entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the holy places<WG39> made with hands,<WG5499> which are the figures<WG499> of the<WG3588> true;<WG228> but<WG235> into<WG1519> heaven<WG3772> itself,<WG846> now<WG3568> to appear<WG1718> in the<WG3588> presence<WG4383> of God<WG2316> for<WG5228> us: <WG2257>

Nor <WG3761> yet that<WG2443> he should offer<WG4374> himself<WG1438> often,<WG4178> as<WG5618> the<WG3588> high priest<WG749> entereth<WG1525> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> holy place<WG39> every year<WG2596> <WG1763> with<WG1722> blood<WG129> of others;<WG245>

For then<WG1893> must<WG1163> he<WG846> often<WG4178> have suffered<WG3958> since<WG575> the foundation<WG2602> of the world:<WG2889> but<WG1161> now<WG3568> once<WG530> in<WG1909> the end<WG4930> of the<WG3588> world<WG165> hath he appeared<WG5319> to put away<WG1519> <WG115> sin<WG266> by<WG1223> the<WG3588> sacrifice<WG2378> of himself.<WG848>
And <WG2532> as<WG2596> <WG3745> it is appointed<WG606> unto men<WG444> once<WG530> to die,<WG599> but<WG1161> after<WG3326> this<WG5124> the judgment: <WG2920>

So <WG3779> Christ<WG5547> was once<WG530> offered<WG4374> to bear<WG399> the sins<WG266> of many;<WG4183> and unto them that look for<WG553> him<WG846> shall he appear<WG3700> the<WG1537> second time<WG1208> without<WG5565> sin<WG266> unto<WG1519> salvation.<WG4991>
